| HistoryText             = A group of scientists from Japan, lead by [[Yamato Takahishi (Earth-616)|Yamato Takahishi]], tried to research ways of protecting Japan from the increasing attacks of atomic super-monsters. In doing so they found the lab of [[Robert Hellsgaard (Earth-616)|Robert Hellsgaard]], and while there they opened the portal to [[Limbo]] and freed him from his prison.

With Hellsgaard's technical support, they went on to kill all the super-monsters in Japan. After that they killed vampires, werewolves, yetis, and poltergeists, but eventually they started to kill mutants and even disfigured people.

After exterminating the monsters on [[Monster Isle]], they discovered and proceeded to attack [[Monster Metropolis]] which contained the [[Legion of Monsters (Earth-616)|Legion of Monsters]] and the newly revived [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] (who was rebuilt as Frankencastle).
